title: Send Large Files - Easy Online File Transfer
meta: Sharing large files becomes quick and direct with our free service, Send Large Files. Transfer big files instantly, securely and without the hassle of registrations.
h2: Fast & Secure Large File Sharing – Send Large Files Online, No Upload, No Limits

featureHighlights.title: Effortless File Sharing
description: Our main goal is to make it easy to send large files in just a few clicks—without any unnecessary steps or complexity.

featureHighlights.title: Completely Free
description: Transfer large files between devices at no cost. No subscriptions, no hidden charges, and no sign-ups required.

featureHighlights.title: Blazing-Fast Transfers
description: We provide a high-speed Experience, direct file sharing without server storage. You can send large files without any delay by simply sharing link or scan QR code.

featureHighlights.title: Secure & Private
description: Your data remains 100% secure, as files are never uploaded to a server. Transfers happen directly between devices, ensuring maximum privacy.

featureHighlights.title: Unlimited File Size
description: Send files of any size without restrictions. Since we don’t store your files on a server, there’s no limit to how large your transfers can be.

featureHighlights.title: Works on Any Device
description: Easily transfer files across different operating systems, including Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS—without compatibility issues.

howTo.heading: How to Transfer Files Between Devices
steps: Select Your File – Click the 'Add File' button to choose large file you want to share.
Generate Link & QR Code – Once selected, unique link and QR code will be created automatically.
Share & Transfer – Copy the link or scan the QR code on the receiving device to download the file instantly.

faqs.question: Do I need to sign up to send large files with FileDropShare?
faqs.answer: No, registration isn’t required. We give freedom to users to transfer large files instantly, free of charge.

faqs.question: Can I share multiple big files by using a single click?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can easily send multiple large files at once by selecting all files at once.

faqs.question: Is file transfer possible between different devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can easily send and receive large to large files between phones, tablets, laptops and desktops within seconds.

faqs.question: Is my file transfer secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, Your large files (videos, photos, documents etc.) are 100% safe and secure during transfer by using our peer-to-peer (P2P) technology, which transfers data directly without uploading it to any server.
